item.title: Migrate NextCloud AIO data directory
item.description: When I faced the issue of migrating the storage directory for my AIO NextCloud the official README sent me to a github discussion whit a somewhat vague answer on how to perform the migration. I thought i would document the process for future reference and if this helps someone else perform a migration like this, that’s a nice bonus. Pre migration tasks Before performing any big changes like this you should backup everything.
